TABLE.NAME: lc_groups
TABLE.COMMENT: the learning companion groups that were created by users

FIELD.NAME: closedgroup
FIELD.COMMENT: set to 1 if you want a group where users have to apply to join

FIELD.NAME: cmid
FIELD.COMMENT: the course module for which this group was created

FIELD.NAME: createdby
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the user who created this group

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the (hidden) course that holds the content for this group

TABLE.NAME: lc_keywords
TABLE.COMMENT: keywords that are assigned to groups

TABLE.NAME: lc_groups_keywords
TABLE.COMMENT: which keywords are assigned to which group

INDEX.NAME: group_keyword
INDEX.COMMENT: Don't want the same keyword to get assigned to a group more than once

TABLE.NAME: lc_group_members
TABLE.COMMENT: who is member of the group, obviously ;)

FIELD.NAME: joined
FIELD.COMMENT: timestamp of when the user joined the group

INDEX.NAME: groupid
INDEX.COMMENT: to improve speed when searching for a group's users

INDEX.NAME: userid
INDEX.COMMENT: to improve speed when searching for a user's groups

INDEX.NAME: group_user
INDEX.COMMENT: Don't want the same user to get assigned to a group more than once
